channel.title: Fix Levels
channel.description:
I need a link to a tutorial or a code so I can fix the levels.
Ex. 1/56 Shown as a level to 56/56
So when everyone levels, their current level goes up with the constant level. Please post only if you have something that will help me!
Also, "(tut) Fix 0/99 stats. (short)" does not work for this problem as I have already tried.

item.title: Fix Levels
item.dc:creator: @Spider680 Spider680
item.description:
@Spider680 wrote:

It usually does that. Did you try just logging out and back in? That usually fixes it.

Read full topic
